meanings.definition: Having a cheerful and lively manner
meanings.sent1: The puppy's tail wagged in a perky manner.
meanings.sent2: She greeted everyone with a perky smile.
meanings.sent3: The perky squirrel chattered happily as it gathered nuts.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden stood perky, reaching for the sun.
meanings.sent5: Her perky attitude brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The children played with perky energy all day.
meanings.sent2: He gave a perky performance that impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The perky team cheered loudly after winning the game.
meanings.sent4: The perky music filled the room with excitement.
meanings.sent5: Her perky dance moves were full of life.

meanings.definition: Standing or sticking up in a lively manner
meanings.sent1: The perky hair bow added a fun touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The perky ears of the dog showed its alertness.
meanings.sent3: The perky plant in the garden swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The perky flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The perky feathers of the bird caught everyone's attention.
